description.value:
Duty to the Throne

Your loyalty to the Golden Throne and the Imperium of Man is absolute. You serve the God-Emperor with unwavering devotion, and your faith strengthens your mind against the enemies of mankind.

Effect: You gain +3 Willpower and (if you meet the WP 40 prerequisite) the Armour of Contempt Talent. You suffer a −10 penalty to Interaction Skill Tests when dealing with any source outside of the Imperium (e.g., aliens and traitors).

system.benefit: You gain +3 Willpower and (if you meet the WP 40 prerequisite) the Armour of Contempt Talent. You suffer −10 to Interaction Tests with non-Imperium sources.

specialAbilities.name: Intolerant of Outsiders
specialAbilities.description: You suffer a −10 penalty to Interaction Skill Tests when dealing with any source outside of the Imperium (e.g., aliens and traitors).
